QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Scarlet Monastery
QuestData.Description: The Warchief demands that able-bodied adventurers assault the Scarlet Monastery, northeast of the Undercity, immediately!$b$bThe Scarlet Crusade has continually threatened Forsaken strongholds throughout the plaguelands. They MUST be destroyed.$b$bReport to the Scarlet Monastery to execute the Warchief's orders and crush the crusade once and for all.
